attributes.action: Mental health service dogs for parity of treatment for mental health.
attributes.additional_details:
Equality Act (updated 20 April 2010)
Health and Social Care Act (2012)
Conservative Party Manifesto 2017: Promises to improve the provision of mental health.
attributes.background: Dogs act as assistants for people with physical disabilities. They are protected by the Equality Act (2010) to access all public spaces. I believe the law should cover mental health assistance dogs under the obligation to provide parity of esteem from the Health and Social Care Act 2012.
